title: Your favorite champion mispronunciations?
body:
{{champion:23}} Trom--ber-deer

{{champion:76}} Nid-AH-lee

{{champion:55}} Katrina

{{champion:90}} Mal-tha-zar

{{champion:79}} Grag-ass

{{champion:121}} Kha-Zeex

{{champion:127}} Liss-Andre

{{champion:56}} Nuck-turn

replies.body: {{champion:254}}  Six
cockzix
http://i.imgur.com/rehab82.jpg"

{{champion:119}} Draven
{{champion:223}} Gordon Ramsey
correct pronunciation: {{champion:119}} DRAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAVEN

{{champion:34}} Avina
{{champion:201}} Brawn
{{champion:77}} oodeer
{{champion:112}} Vector
{{champion:92}} Whore  :p
Oo-deer is the proper pronunciation though. o.o
Oh dear.

{{champion:266}} at-rocks
{{champion:2}} O-Laugh

o.o
I haven't heard anyone use any of these. What's wrong with Nid-ah-lee and Grag-ass?

> [{quoted}](name=Environmentalist,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=nZAPTIzj,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-19T19:45:25.594+0000)
>
> o.o
> I haven't heard anyone use any of these. What's wrong with Nid-ah-lee and Grag-ass?

I believe it is Nid-Uh-Lee and Grag-Us

But really not a big deal on those 2...

There was a funny VOD where some Rioters went over bad pronunciations... Sejuani was a hoot..

> [{quoted}](name=Linthe,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=nZAPTIzj,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-10-19T19:48:52.353+0000)
>
> I believe it is Nid-Uh-Lee and Grag-Us
> 
> But really not a big deal on those 2...
> 
> There was a funny VOD where some Rioters went over bad pronunciations... Sejuani was a hoot..

It was supposed to be an earth-shattering Nay-Seuss! Mmmmmm...
Aha fair enough. I was on skype with a french guy once and he pronounced {{champion:75}} as Nay-zoose. hahaha
Nidalee should be Nid-uh-lee, but one of my friends pronounces it Ni-dah-lee

Since we are here.. my favorite pronunciation story... The LCS  (EU iirc) are discussing whether it's pronounced Shayco or Shaco (like back).

And Meteos tweets: It's pronounced Shaco not Shaco.

Haha I remember that.

It's totally Shack-O instead of Shay-Co, because of his Nutcrack-O skin. Nutcrack-O, not Nutcray-Co
That was fun to read.
{{champion:64}} Lee Sin.
It's pronounced "Lee Sin, the Blind Monk"
my friends call {{champion:157}} Yasaho. That one is pretty fun to say though
{{champion:75}} Nasus (this is wrong, you keep reading it backwards)
Nyedalee.
Mispronunciations? I've been saying them like this the whole time.
{{champion:1}} Any

When I was younger I use to pronounce {{champion:92}} Revan

but Riven is not a Sith Lord or a Jedi Knight. or is she?

http://img11.deviantart.net/420b/i/2015/107/9/8/jedi_riven_by_skyeexcalibur-d7iones.png
Jedi Knight Riven... Starts with a Vibroblade, pressing R turns it into a lightsaber.

I've heard 'Trymander' (Try-man-duh), 'Alkali' (Like the metal), Ackelli (Ack-el-eye), 'Xin Chao' (Zin-Chow) and 'Draraaaayven' (Dra-raaaay-ven) to name a few. Half of these were from the rioters video mentioned on this thread.
{{champion:119}} You don't say Draven. You say Draaaaaaaaven.
My friends pronounce yasuo yoosow
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/walkingdead/images/c/cc/Grandma_-_What_is_this_i_don't_even.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20131109151911
